”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Brought to you by best selling business author John Lamerton and his business partner and friend, Jason Brockman, this weekly briefing will help small businesses think bigger. With topics to help your business grow, you will find out how we grew 6 different businesses to over £100k annual profits, and how we can help you do the same.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
